changePassword.description: Fadlan geli sirta ee hadda iyo kan cusub

toastMessages.password_update_Successfully: Cusboonaysiinta sirta si guul leh dhameystiray
toastMessages.failedToUpdatePassword: Ku guuldareystay in la cusboonaysiiyo sirta

validation.password_required: Furaha sirta ah ayaa loo baahan yahay
validation.password_min_length: Furaha sirta ah waa inuu ahaadaa ugu yaraan 5 xaraf
validation.password_max_length: Sirta ah waa inuusan dhaafin 15 xaraf
validation.password_not_same_as_old: Furaha cusubi la mid ma noqon karo

forgotPassword.description: Fadlan geli magacaaga isticmaale ee diiwaangashan iyo Lambarka telefoonka si aad dib ugu dejiso sirta ah.

validation.phoneNumberrequired: Lambarka taleefanka ayaa loo baahan yahay

passwordReset.title: Dib u habaynta sirta
passwordReset.description: Furahaaga ama sirtat si guul leh ayaa dib loo bedelay Hoos ku dhufo si aad u gasho

otpVerification.title: Xaqiijinta lambarka sirta ah (OTP)
otpVerification.description: Fadlan geli lambarka sirta ah (OTP) ee laguugu soo diray lambarkaaga moobiilka. Meeshan waa qasab in la buuxiyo.

buttons.resend_otp: Mar kale dir OTP-ga ama lambarka sirta ah

toastMessages.resend_otp_failed: Ku guuldareystay inuu dib u soo diro OTP
toastMessages.otp_not_found: Aqoonsiga lambarka sirta ah (OTP) lama helin. Fadlan codso OTP cusub.
toastMessages.something_went_wrong: Wax baa khaldamay isku day markale!

newPassword.title: Beddel furaha sirta ee cusub
newPassword.description: Samee furaha sirta ah ee cusub Hubi inay ka duwan tahay kuwii hore xagga amniga.

validation.password_required: Furaha sirta ah ayaa loo baahan yahay
validation.password_min_length: Furaha sirta ah waa inuu ahaadaa ugu yaraan 5 xaraf
validation.password_max_length: Furaha sirta ah waa inuusan dhaafin 15 xaraf
validation.passwordsDoNotMatch: Labadan sir isku mid ma aha
